summary: The 'Saving the Department of the Interior's Workforce Act' aims to protect Department of the Interior employees from involuntary separations. The bill imposes a moratorium on reductions in force (RIFs) and involuntary separations for employees in the competitive service, excepted service, and Senior Executive Service until full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2026 are enacted. This is with the exception of separations due to misconduct, delinquency, or performance issues.
